lines.name: The Queen's Sacrifice
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat Atziri, Queen of the Vaal in the Alluring Abyss while holding Atziri's Mirror.
lines.flavourText: The ancient queen casts her gaze upon her reflection, and at last the curse is broken.

lines.name: Trash to Treasure
lines.prophecyText: You will turn a normal item into a unique item with a single Chance Orb.
lines.flavourText: A blank canvas holds untold potential, but the artist's fortunate hand transforms it into a masterpiece.

lines.name: Fated Connections
lines.prophecyText: You will create a fully-linked six-socket item using only Jeweller's Orbs.
lines.flavourText: Five and fewer stand alone, but six draws them together.

lines.name: Song of the Sekhema
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat Garukhan, Queen of the Winds while holding Asenath's Mark.
lines.flavourText: The Sekhema's whispers fight back the wind, leaving no mark remaining.

lines.name: A Dishonourable Death
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat The Dishonoured Queen while holding Hyrri's Bite.
lines.flavourText: The dishonoured niece of the king is decisively laid to rest by her own bite.

lines.name: Lost in the Pages
lines.prophecyText: You will track down a powerful Undying Archivist in a map who will drop a unique item when slain.
lines.flavourText: Hundreds of years with nothing but books twists a once great mind.

lines.name: The Mentor
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat The Cleansing Light while holding Matua Tupuna.
lines.flavourText: One falls, but another rises to lead.

lines.name: The Bowstring's Music
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat Nightwane while holding Death's Harp.
lines.flavourText: The brittle archer's bow plays a song of death, but the harp sings a sweet masterpiece.

lines.name: Blind Faith
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat Barthol, the Pure while holding The Ignomon.
lines.flavourText: Two sides, light and dark, collide, and leave all but one blind.

lines.name: A Master Seeks Help
lines.prophecyText: You will find Jun and complete her mission.
lines.flavourText: Pursuing a world of perfect balance, a veiled master seeks aid.

lines.name: A Prodigious Hand
lines.prophecyText: You will track down a powerful Sutured Aberration who will drop a unique item when slain.
lines.flavourText: The dead one brought back to life by means other than corruption now holds the hands that revived it.

lines.name: Cleanser of Sins
lines.prophecyText: You will track down a powerful Undying Evangelist who will drop a unique item when slain.
lines.flavourText: The Evangelist does not practise what he preaches, but death wipes clean the slate.

lines.name: Monstrous Treasure
lines.prophecyText: You will travel to a map where the monsters lie in wait, open the boxes they guard, and slay them all.
lines.flavourText: In a long lost dream, great foes hide in tiny boxes, but so do great rewards.

lines.name: The King's Path
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat Kaom while holding Kaom's Sign.
lines.flavourText: Madness feeds the King's fury in the raging mouth of the volcano. His last vision will be a sign.

lines.name: Darktongue's Shriek
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat Doedre the Defiler while holding Windscream.
lines.flavourText: Where the dead still rest, the defiler's scream bellows through the tombs before falling eternally silent.

lines.name: Pools of Wealth
lines.prophecyText: You will encounter and slay golden elementals deep in the Cavern of Anger.
lines.flavourText: Beckoned by the Siren's song, wrathful gold rises from the ground.

lines.name: Vaal Winds
lines.prophecyText: You will discover an area with a Corrupting Tempest
lines.flavourText: Corruption is carried on a red wind, and spreads to all who are touched.

lines.name: A Master Seeks Help
lines.prophecyText: You will find Zana and complete her mission.
lines.flavourText: Lost in the miasma of dream, a master of many realms seeks aid.

lines.name: The Malevolent Witch
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat Erythrophagia while holding Doedre's Tenure.
lines.flavourText: Silence and darkness harbour growing malevolence as the blood eater meets her maker.

lines.name: Fire and Ice
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat Hailrake while holding Hrimsorrow.
lines.flavourText: Cold sorrow turns to burning fury that hails across the shattered ship.

lines.name: Storm on the Horizon
lines.prophecyText: You will track down a powerful Brittle Poacher who will drop a unique item when slain.
lines.flavourText: The poacher's bowstring snaps like dry bone and crackles like thunder.

lines.name: Twice Enchanted
lines.prophecyText: You will be rewarded with two uses of the Enchantment Device on completing the Labyrinth
lines.flavourText: A golden device hidden by a rotting emperor overflows with power.

lines.name: The Great Leader of the North
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat Boulderback while holding The Magnate.
lines.flavourText: The boulder is crushed atop the hill, letting the great leader's people pass.

lines.name: Fire and Brimstone
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat Hatebeat while holding Blackgleam.
lines.flavourText: Living cinders set the stone alight, a gleaming signal in the blackness where husks are burned.

lines.name: The Jeweller's Touch
lines.prophecyText: You will create a fully-linked five-socket item with a single Jeweller's Orb
lines.flavourText: The Jeweller leaves five fingerprints and connects them with a single thread.

lines.name: The Apex Predator
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat the Hundred Foot Shadow while holding Screaming Eagle.
lines.flavourText: The eagle battles the vulture in the shadow of a dying sun, and becomes something greater.

lines.name: The Ambitious Bandit III
lines.prophecyText: You will encounter and slay bandits in the Library, Academy Map, Museum Map, or Scriptorium Map.
lines.flavourText: Where relics and tomes gather dust, a bandit's eyes see great value.

lines.name: The Misunderstood Queen
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat the Bone Queen while holding Queen's Decree.
lines.flavourText: A queen of bone raises an army and flees among walls of flesh.

lines.name: The Bishop's Legacy
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat Pagan Bishop of Agony while holding Geofri's Crest.
lines.flavourText: The crest becomes a crown when placed upon the Bishop's brow.

lines.name: Beyond Sight IV
lines.prophecyText: You will slay the Herald of Bameth and the very powerful foe it summons.
lines.flavourText: My vision grows dark. A horror draws near. Its soul would be a treasured prize for Hinekora.

lines.name: Echoes of Witchcraft
lines.prophecyText: You will travel to the stone circle in the Western Forest, and destroy the Echo of Doedre Darktongue who waits there.
lines.flavourText: A circle of silent giants imprisons a memory of undying misery. A dark tongue whispers dark words carried by the western winds.

lines.name: Flesh of the Beast
lines.prophecyText: You will track down a powerful Bonewarped Warrior who will drop a unique item when slain.
lines.flavourText: Stripped of its flesh, a warrior fights to protect the piece of the beast it has carved.

lines.name: The Karui Rebellion
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat the Gemling Legionnaires while holding Karui Ward.
lines.flavourText: Thaumaturgy and faith clash among giant ruins; a recreation of a long-gone rebellion.

lines.name: Wind and Thunder
lines.prophecyText: You will track down a powerful Galvanic Ribbon in a map who will drop a unique item when slain.
lines.flavourText: The dreaming fabric flutters and cracks in the wind like thunder. A sharp sound that freezes the blood.

lines.name: The Servant's Heart
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat Fidelitas while holding Storm Cloud.
lines.flavourText: The Servant's sacrifice summons a storm in the Prodigy's soul.

lines.name: Visions of the Drowned
lines.prophecyText: You will find an area littered with the drowned.
lines.flavourText: Damp and bloated with water and goods. Sometimes treasure washes ashore.

lines.name: Thaumaturgical History IV
lines.prophecyText: You will read Malachai's Dedication in The Harvest.
lines.flavourText: Where the Soulless One left his physical form behind, a dangerous new threat emerges.

lines.name: Severed Limbs
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat Hammerstorm while holding Limbsplit.
lines.flavourText: A storm of stone stops when the last of the limbs are severed and blood flows no more.

lines.name: The Eagle's Cry
lines.prophecyText: You will track down a powerful Murk Runner who will drop a unique item when slain.
lines.flavourText: A flightless fowl charges through rotten wooden ribs; its scream gives even the battle-hardened pause.

lines.name: Fire, Wood and Stone
lines.prophecyText: You will track down a powerful Cinder Elemental in a map who will drop a unique item when slain.
lines.flavourText: With crushing weight, the stone figure roams the halls. It burns eternally yet grows no lighter.

lines.name: The Unbreathing Queen V
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat the Unbreathing Queen in a Cemetery map.
lines.flavourText: The Unbreathing Queen raises an army in a dream of tombs and graves. She knows you are coming.

lines.name: Path of Betrayal
lines.prophecyText: You will encounter Karui Spirits near Weathered Carvings, and send them back to Hinekora.
lines.flavourText: Cut down by the king's hand, southern spirits linger near the bones of giants.

lines.name: The Great Mind of the North
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat Hector Titucius, Eternal Servant while holding The Magnate.
lines.flavourText: The Eternal servant bathes in his own blood, and a master tactician is born.

lines.name: Unbearable Whispers V
lines.prophecyText: You will discover a dangerous tome in the final chamber of the Labyrinth.
lines.flavourText: The trapped emperor unknowingly protects foul knowledge. Dark pages amongst bright treasures.

lines.name: A Vision of Ice and Fire
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat Sumter the Twisted while holding Heatshiver.
lines.flavourText: Where the river meets the sea, the flames meet winter's chill, and heated battle sends a shiver down a twisted spine.

lines.name: The Forgotten Soldiers
lines.prophecyText: You will encounter the risen weapons of a fallen army around Lioneye's Standard in The Climb.
lines.flavourText: The banner in the breeze marks the resting place of lions, whose metal fangs still thirst for blood.

lines.name: A Master Seeks Help
lines.prophecyText: You will find Alva and complete her mission.
lines.flavourText: Blind to all but gold, a master treasure hunter seeks aid.

lines.name: The Feral Lord V
lines.prophecyText: You will discover and slay a very powerful fiery Rhoa in a Mud Geyser map.
lines.flavourText: To the realm of dreams the Feral Lord flees, and leaves in his wake a burning nightmare.

lines.name: The Silverwood
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat Targa, Beast Poacher while holding Silverbranch.
lines.flavourText: A thief, bow in hand, flees to the wooded outskirts.

lines.name: The Plaguemaw V
lines.prophecyText: You will enter the Plaguemaw's chamber in the Crystal Veins or Crystal Ore Map.
lines.flavourText: A room, etched in crystal, plays home to the Plaguemaw. He awaits you.

lines.name: A Call into the Void
lines.prophecyText: You will track down a powerful Talon Archer in a map who will drop a unique item when slain.
lines.flavourText: The dreaming cockerel crows thrice, and thunder bellows from the void.

lines.name: A Regal Death
lines.prophecyText: You will slay a very powerful king or queen, and it will drop a Regal Orb.
lines.flavourText: Blue blood drains from a cut-throat, and turns what it touches to gold.

lines.name: An Unseen Peril
lines.prophecyText: You will be attacked by stronger than normal monsters when opening a Strongbox.
lines.flavourText: A trap is set, a lure is placed, but stronger foes lie in wait.

lines.name: Anarchy's End I
lines.prophecyText: You will enter a map and slay a Rogue Exile who is carrying a Divination Card.
lines.flavourText: A criminal of Theopolis flees into dream carrying a fortuneteller's tool.

lines.name: Anarchy's End II
lines.prophecyText: You will enter a map and slay two Rogue Exiles who are each carrying a Divination Card.
lines.flavourText: Two criminals carry the fortuneteller's tools as they hunt for the body of their dreaming ally.

lines.name: Anarchy's End III
lines.prophecyText: You will enter a map and slay four Rogue Exiles who are each carrying a Divination Card.
lines.flavourText: A party of four criminals, each with the mark of the fortuneteller, hunt through dreams for their prosecutor.

lines.name: Anarchy's End IV
lines.prophecyText: You will enter a map and slay six Rogue Exiles who are each carrying a Divination Card.
lines.flavourText: Six criminals take to foot to stamp out the threat that tracks them through dreams.

lines.name: Ancient Doom
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat the Vaal Oversoul while holding Doomfletch.
lines.flavourText: Doom grows at the apex of the pyramid.

lines.name: Baptism by Death
lines.prophecyText: You will track down a powerful Death Bishop who will drop a unique item when slain.
lines.flavourText: The bishop's flock is long gone, yet still he wields his hefty crook.

lines.name: Beyond Sight I
lines.prophecyText: You will slay the cultists and the foes they summon.
lines.flavourText: A dark presence hides just out of sight. Only bodies betray its movements.

lines.name: Beyond Sight III
lines.prophecyText: You will slay the cultists and the powerful foes they summon.
lines.flavourText: Monsters not of this world spill forth. Only shapes and movement. A warped vision.

lines.name: Blood in the Eyes
lines.prophecyText: You will track down a powerful Mad Gladiator in a map who will drop a unique item when slain.
lines.flavourText: Blood stains the fighter's eyes and rains upon the dirt. He sees and dreams in crimson.

lines.name: Crushing Squall
lines.prophecyText: You will discover an area with a Crushing Tempest
lines.flavourText: The sky trembles and the ground below answers with crushing force.

lines.name: Custodians of Silence
lines.prophecyText: You will track down a powerful Assault Ribbon who will drop a unique item when slain.
lines.flavourText: The temple untouched for centuries, the guardians clean and pure, yet they too must meet the Mother.

lines.name: Day of Sacrifice I
lines.prophecyText: You will slay a powerful Vaal Fallen who will drop a Sacrifice at Dawn fragment.
lines.flavourText: The ancient red champion is fallen, but a killing blow reveals his final sacrifice beneath the morning sun.

lines.name: Day of Sacrifice IV
lines.prophecyText: You will encounter an invading foe in a rare, corrupted map, who will drop a Sacrifice at Midnight fragment.
lines.flavourText: A corrupted dream invites an invader, who hunts in the deepest night.

lines.name: Deadly Rivalry I
lines.prophecyText: You will encounter a rival Exile imbued with Nemesis powers.
lines.flavourText: You draw the ire of another, imbued with golden power.

lines.name: Deadly Rivalry IV
lines.prophecyText: You will encounter the rival Exile, now imbued with the powers of a Shrine
lines.flavourText: Prayer at a dark altar mends torn flesh once again, but darkness still fills the soul. Each defeat feeds their determination.

lines.name: Deadly Rivalry V
lines.prophecyText: You will encounter the rival Exile, now backed by others of a shared Bloodline.
lines.flavourText: Allies arrive for a final battle, filled with shared blood. The breaking and mending takes its toll.

lines.name: Dying Cry
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat General Gravicius while holding Deidbell.
lines.flavourText: The bell tolls, the people gather, the General is executed. The militia cries out and charges forth.

lines.name: Erased from Memory
lines.prophecyText: You will slay a very powerful foe and it will drop an Orb of Scouring.
lines.flavourText: A foe feared for an aeon falls and is scoured from the pages of history.

lines.name: Erasmus' Gift
lines.prophecyText: You will discover a 20% quality gem.
lines.flavourText: The kind gemcutter scattered his beautiful craft for the paupers, but greedy hands hide them.

lines.name: Gilded Within
lines.prophecyText: You will slay a powerful foe and it will drop a rare item.
lines.flavourText: Gold without, gold within. Blood comes in many colours, but the gilded always bleed gold.

lines.name: Ice from Above
lines.prophecyText: You will discover an area with an Arctic Tempest
lines.flavourText: The cold blusters from above, chilling the unwary to the bone.

lines.name: Kalandra's Craft
lines.prophecyText: You will slay a foe who drops four identical rare items.
lines.flavourText: A grand treasure fractures like a dropped mirror, yet somehow goes unharmed.

lines.name: Plague of Rats
lines.prophecyText: You will discover a series of indoor chambers flooded with rats.
lines.flavourText: They run, they bite, they flee, they die. Swarms of fur and teeth and tail drown each and every room.

lines.name: Possessed Foe
lines.prophecyText: You will encounter one or more very powerful monsters possessed by a Tormented Spirit.
lines.flavourText: A name remembered all this time, their will stolen by a vengeful spirit.

lines.name: Power Magnified
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat Piety while holding Reverberation Rod
lines.flavourText: The pious grow powerful surrounded by a sea of blood and empty husks

lines.name: Resistant to Change
lines.prophecyText: You will use an Orb of Transmutation on a ring, shield, or amulet, and it will gain resistances.
lines.flavourText: Wreathed in blue sinew, it is protected from the flames, the storms and the snow alike.

lines.name: Thaumaturgical History I
lines.prophecyText: You will read Shavronne's Journal in the Warden's Quarters.
lines.flavourText: The Aesthete's monstrous techniques are protected by the shadows.

lines.name: The Alchemist
lines.prophecyText: You will slay an Undying Alchemist, and it will drop an Orb of Alchemy.
lines.flavourText: A fool tries to turn lead to gold, but a deft hand takes it by force.

lines.name: The Beautiful Guide
lines.prophecyText: You will greatly enhance the quality of a map with a single Cartographer's Chisel.
lines.flavourText: A single tap from the chisel, and the guide's marks grow far clearer.

lines.name: The Beginning and the End
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat Archbishop Geofri while holding Realmshaper.
lines.flavourText: The archbishop plays witness to his own cold death and cremation.

lines.name: The Brutal Enforcer
lines.prophecyText: You will track down a powerful Blackguard Elite who will drop a unique item when slain.
lines.flavourText: In a society that values violence, the violent rise through the ranks like oil through water.

lines.name: The Child of Lunaris
lines.prophecyText: Near the Crossroads, you will encounter the Child of Lunaris in the ruins of a temple, and slay it.
lines.flavourText: The light of Lunaris shines on her child who walks in stone shrine's ruins.

lines.name: The Dream Trial
lines.prophecyText: You will discover a Trial of Ascendancy in a map.
lines.flavourText: The depths of a dream hide a gauntlet that sharpens the body and mind.

lines.name: The Dreamer's Dream
lines.prophecyText: You will enter a certain map, and when you slay the very powerful foe that has made it its home, it will drop a rare map.
lines.flavourText: The greatest threat, deep in dream, holds the key to another world.

lines.name: The Feral Lord III
lines.prophecyText: You will encounter corrupted animals in the Dried Lake, Desert Map, or Wasteland Map and slay them.
lines.flavourText: Where water shimmers no more, thunderous beasts are dragged into the Feral Lord's domain.

lines.name: The Flayed Man
lines.prophecyText: You will track down a powerful Gut Flayer in a map who will drop a unique item when slain.
lines.flavourText: The flayed becomes the flayer, stripping flesh from muscle with a sharpened edge.

lines.name: The Forgotten Garrison
lines.prophecyText: Near the Broken Bridge, you will encounter and slay an army of undead in the ruins of the fortress.
lines.flavourText: Where bandits have taken hold, a lifeless army rises to guard the ruined fortress.

lines.name: The Fortune Teller's Collection
lines.prophecyText: You will find a chest containing Divination Cards in a map.
lines.flavourText: The dreaming seeker finds what a fortune teller forgets.

lines.name: The Hollow Pledge
lines.prophecyText: You will track down a powerful Tunneler in a map who will drop a unique item when slain.
lines.flavourText: Grasping blindly through a dark dream, a final pledge turns brittle flesh to dust.

lines.name: The Lost Undying
lines.prophecyText: You will track down a powerful Skulking Dweller who will drop a unique item when slain.
lines.flavourText: Trapped with his emperor when the crown was taken, he seeks to change his fate.

lines.name: The Nest
lines.prophecyText: You will track down a powerful Noxious Tarantula in a map who will drop a unique item when slain.
lines.flavourText: Rats become tangled in the spider's web; a meal within a nest within a dream.

lines.name: The Plaguemaw I
lines.prophecyText: You will encounter a powerful golem in a Vaal side area and defeat it.
lines.flavourText: The Plaguemaw enters the red realm and leaves a swirling mass of living stone.

lines.name: The Plaguemaw IV
lines.prophecyText: You will be ambushed by the Plaguemaw's followers in the Imperial Gardens, Gardens Map, Courtyard Map, or Orchard Map.
lines.flavourText: In a maze of green, the Plaguemaw sets a trap baited with treasures.

lines.name: The Prison Key
lines.prophecyText: You will track down a powerful Bearded Devil who will drop a unique item when slain.
lines.flavourText: The gate is unlocked, but the key remains in the hands of a devil.

lines.name: The Snuffed Flame
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat Chatters while holding Kaltenhalt.
lines.flavourText: Cold bones rattle in stone cells, extinguishing all light, all warmth, all hope.

lines.name: The Soulless Beast
lines.prophecyText: You will track down a powerful Ancient Construct who will drop a unique item when slain.
lines.flavourText: Powered by twin wings, the mechanical monster roams the ruins.

lines.name: The Sword King's Passion
lines.prophecyText: You will track down a powerful Mad Gladiator who will drop a unique item when slain.
lines.flavourText: Once a challenger to the crown, he holds in his hands the Sword King's blade.

lines.name: The Twins
lines.prophecyText: You will encounter an area where powerful monsters are duplicated.
lines.flavourText: What was one is now two. The strong find greater strength in numbers.

lines.name: The Undead Storm
lines.prophecyText: You will discover an area with a Morbid Tempest
lines.flavourText: Bones fall from the sky and take the shape of the men they once were.

lines.name: The Vanguard
lines.prophecyText: You will track down a powerful Voll's Vanguard who will drop a unique item when slain.
lines.flavourText: The Vanguard lead the funereal march, playing hymns of death with their bowstrings.

lines.name: The Ward's Ward
lines.prophecyText: You will track down a powerful Bearded Shaman who will drop a unique item when slain.
lines.flavourText: The false shaman's death uncovers ancestral allurement locked in ancient stone.

lines.name: The Warmongers I
lines.prophecyText: You will encounter and slay several Warbands.
lines.flavourText: A vanguard seeks to claim land that is not theirs.

lines.name: The Warmongers IV
lines.prophecyText: You will encounter and slay several Warbands and their leader.
lines.flavourText: The leader arrives, and lays plans to paint the land red with your blood.

lines.name: The Watcher's Watcher
lines.prophecyText: You will track down a powerful Wandering Eye who will drop a unique item when slain.
lines.flavourText: Unblinking, it watches. Unendingly, it is watched.

lines.name: Unbearable Whispers IV
lines.prophecyText: You will slay a certain powerful monster and it will drop a tome.
lines.flavourText: Forbidden words ring in the ears of the powerful; the Whisperer's influence spreads.

lines.name: Unnatural Energy
lines.prophecyText: You will encounter a powerful Lightning Elemental near the Battlefront bridge.
lines.flavourText: Unnatural energies hold those in black at bay, but the barrier bends for crackling kin.

lines.name: Vital Transformation
lines.prophecyText: You will use an Orb of Transmutation on a ring or amulet and it will gain a life mod.
lines.flavourText: Blue tendrils envelop, breathing life into the beautifully inert.

lines.name: Weeping Death
lines.prophecyText: You will track down a powerful Dripping Dead in a map who will drop a unique item when slain.
lines.flavourText: Striding dryly through the mud, yet dripping with rot, he waits for the Mother's touch.

lines.name: Greed's Folly
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat Guardian of the Vault while holding Wondertrap.
lines.flavourText: A trap of greed is laid in the Vault, and sprung at its heart by a wonder.

lines.name: Cold Blooded Fury
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat Glace while holding Bloodboil.
lines.flavourText: Winter weaves the cannibal's cold fury until his blood boils over.

lines.name: Dance of Steel
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat The Steel Soul while holding The Dancing Dervish.
lines.flavourText: A soul of steel shatters, and a spinning shard joins the eternal dance.

lines.name: The Storm Spire
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat Poporo, the Highest Spire while holding The Stormheart.
lines.flavourText: Cold ocean winds whip across the sharp stones where two yet battle for control.

lines.name: Last of the Wildmen
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat Master of the Blade while holding Briskwrap.
lines.flavourText: The Master's blade strikes the ground, and his body briskly follows. The line of the Wild Men ends.

lines.name: Trapped in the Tower
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat Caliga, Imperatrix while holding Fencoil.
lines.flavourText: The Imperatrix traps her subjects in the shining sceptre, but it is she who becomes mired.

lines.name: End of the Light
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat Tsoagoth, The Brine King while holding Icetomb.
lines.flavourText: The king rots in his frozen tomb, atop the island of his own creation.

lines.name: Cold Greed
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat Fragment of Winter while holding Cameria's Maul.
lines.flavourText: Avarice turns the heart as cold as a fragment of Winter itself.

lines.name: The Nightmare Awakens
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat Eater of Souls while holding Malachai's Simula.
lines.flavourText: The Eater has his final meal, and the Soulless One awakens.

lines.name: Crimson Hues
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat Visceris while holding Goredrill.
lines.flavourText: The ruins hide an artist whose own crimson ink coats the stone.

lines.name: Battle Hardened
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat Tyrant while holding Iron Heart.
lines.flavourText: The eager warrior meets the Tyrant in battle. Outmatched and outwitted; he uses his strength to best his foe.

lines.name: A Master Seeks Help
lines.prophecyText: You will find Niko and complete his mission.
lines.flavourText: Maniacally digging in endless darkness, a master miner seeks aid.

lines.name: Defiled in the Sceptre
lines.prophecyText: You will encounter a group of strong miscreations in the Upper Sceptre of God, and slay them all.
lines.flavourText: Stolen from their homes, innocent flesh is twisted and shaped atop the tower.

lines.name: Mouth of Horrors
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat Doedre while holding Chalice of Horrors.
lines.flavourText: The vile witch whispers words of horror, and sups from the chalice one final time.

lines.name: Thaumaturgical History II
lines.prophecyText: You will read Doedre's Proclamation in The Western Forest in Act 2.
lines.flavourText: The Tongueless Witch's words speak through the stone to desperate followers.

lines.name: The Prison Guard
lines.prophecyText: You will track down a powerful Axiom Thunderguard who will drop a unique item when slain.
lines.flavourText: Clad in black, the guard holds the key to unleashing the storm.

lines.name: Agony at Dusk
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat Maligaro, The Inquisitor while holding Dusktoe.
lines.flavourText: In the beast's belly, the Inquisitor hunts the dying light.

lines.name: Faith Exhumed
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat Tolman, the Exhumer while holding Chober Chaber.
lines.flavourText: The lost lover returns, but faith releases him from his service.

lines.name: A Forest of False Idols
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat Torchoak Grove while holding Araku Tiki.
lines.flavourText: A grove of wooden faces spit fire, a cheap mockery of unimaginable power.

lines.name: The King and the Brambles
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat Daresso while holding Bramblejack.
lines.flavourText: The Blade King's blood feeds brambles that grow ever thicker.

lines.name: The Unbreathing Queen IV
lines.prophecyText: You will encounter the spirit of a hero in the Temple of Decay or Arachnid Tomb Map and defeat it.
lines.flavourText: A tangle of web trapped the body, now stolen. The Unbreathing Queen leaves behind a sorrowful soul whose howls thunder through the halls.

lines.name: Burning Dread
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat Piety the Empyrean while holding Dreadarc.
lines.flavourText: The Empyrian faces her dread and perishes; her arc now complete.

lines.name: A Master Seeks Help
lines.prophecyText: You will find Einhar and complete his mission.
lines.flavourText: Prognosticating impending doom, a master survivalist seeks aid.

lines.name: Pleasure and Pain
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat Shavronne while holding Crown of Thorns.
lines.flavourText: A single thorn slips through stretched skin; pain turns to power.

lines.name: Deadly Twins
lines.prophecyText: You will enter a map and slay the Twinned bosses in it.
lines.flavourText: In a long-lost dream, one deadly foe becomes two.

lines.name: Heavy Blows
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat Gneiss while holding Craghead
lines.flavourText: Living stone strides across the field, each step shakes the earth and rattles the soul.

lines.name: A Rift in Time
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat Riftwalker while holding Timeclasp.
lines.flavourText: The rift is torn open, and time's clasp is twisted.

lines.name: Blood of the Betrayed
lines.prophecyText: You will track down a powerful Kaom's Chosen in a map who will drop a unique item when slain.
lines.flavourText: Slain by their king, they live only in memory, but their lust for blood remains unsated.

lines.name: Risen Blood
lines.prophecyText: You will kill a powerful monster, whose blood takes on a new form.
lines.flavourText: Life flows through the blood. Let slip the blood, and the life will continue in a new form.

lines.name: In the Grasp of Corruption
lines.prophecyText: You will encounter a powerful undead Blackguard in the Imperial Gardens.
lines.flavourText: A soldier in black's journey is cut short at the foot of the tower. The flesh rots, but the bone grows yet.

lines.name: Fire from the Sky
lines.prophecyText: You will discover an area with an Infernal Tempest
lines.flavourText: Fire rains down across the land. Beware the path you take.

lines.name: Plague of Frogs
lines.prophecyText: You will discover an outdoor location flooded with frogs.
lines.flavourText: Wet and slippery flesh, clinging feet and tongue. No matter the colour before, now the earth is green.

lines.name: Reforged Bonds
lines.prophecyText: You will end a Bloodline.
lines.flavourText: A bond of blood breaks, but from the carnage new bonds may be formed.

lines.name: Beyond Sight II
lines.prophecyText: You will slay the cultists and the powerful foes they summon.
lines.flavourText: A visible following forms around an invisible foe. It grows greater yet remains veiled.

lines.name: Bountiful Traps
lines.prophecyText: You will enter a map that holds six additional Strongboxes.
lines.flavourText: In a distant dream, six traps with the promise of treasure wait to be sprung.

lines.name: The Scout
lines.prophecyText: You will encounter and slay a Rogue Exile, who calls forth a Warband.
lines.flavourText: One like you roams the land, but they are just the first of many.

lines.name: Heart of the Fire
lines.prophecyText: You will track down a powerful Solar Guard who will drop a unique item when slain.
lines.flavourText: Its one desire is to see the world burn. A shard of fury stokes the undying fire in its heart.

lines.name: The Sinner's Stone
lines.prophecyText: You will track down a powerful Sin Lord who will drop a unique item when slain.
lines.flavourText: A lord of sin roams hollow halls protected from the spells he sings.

lines.name: The Dreaded Rhoa
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat Skullbeak while holding Redbeak.
lines.flavourText: The rhoa's rage builds and boils over; a feeling of dread envelops the crimson beak.

lines.name: Living Fires
lines.prophecyText: You will discover a powerful fire golem at Fire Fury's camp in The Coast.
lines.flavourText: Where the sand meets the water, the flesheater's flames shine brighter and brighter still.

lines.name: Nature's Resilience
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat Calaf, Headstaver while holding Springleaf.
lines.flavourText: Thieves camp beneath roadside trees, but it is their leader who falls like the mighty oak.

lines.name: Sun's Punishment
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat Dawn, Harbinger of Solaris while holding Sundance.
lines.flavourText: Death's dance with dawn leads to the midday sun, whose spiteful zenith burns indiscriminately.

lines.name: Forceful Exorcism
lines.prophecyText: You will kill a foe possessed by a Tormented Spirit, freeing the spirit.
lines.flavourText: A pained spirit hijacks a body, and will not be stopped by that body's demise.

lines.name: Black Devotion
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat Litanius, the Black Prayer while holding Geofri's Baptism.
lines.flavourText: The Black Prayer falls silent in the face of the Archbishop's shimmering devotion.

lines.name: The Mysterious Gift
lines.prophecyText: You will trade five unique items with a vendor.
lines.flavourText: A merchant seeks to trade misfitting gifts. Five for one, but what is the one?

lines.name: Waiting in Ambush
lines.prophecyText: You will be attacked by a Rogue Exile when opening a Strongbox.
lines.flavourText: A chest of goods hides many challenges, but one goes unseen even to the wise.

lines.name: Dark Instincts
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat Arakaali, Spinner of Shadows while holding Foxshade.
lines.flavourText: Guided by luck, the fox hunts the spider in absolute shadow.

lines.name: Deadly Rivalry II
lines.prophecyText: You will encounter the rival Exile, now also imbued with Onslaught.
lines.flavourText: Their defeat will not stand, renewed and fueled by blind rage.

lines.name: The Walking Mountain
lines.prophecyText: You will track down a powerful Ruined Titan who will drop a unique item when slain.
lines.flavourText: Shaped by magic, the tool that breathes life into the titan's stone lies at its heart.

lines.name: The Corrupt
lines.prophecyText: You will slay a powerful enemy in a Vaal side area and it will drop a Vaal Orb.
lines.flavourText: To plow a field, you need a tool. To harvest grain, you need a tool. To spread corruption, you need a tool.

lines.name: The Four Feral Exiles
lines.prophecyText: You will enter a map that holds four additional Rogue Exiles.
lines.flavourText: In a faraway dream, four souls far from home prepare to fight to the death.

lines.name: A Whispered Prayer
lines.prophecyText: You will track down a powerful Frost Preacher who will drop a unique item when slain.
lines.flavourText: A preacher whispers to the skies and the skies answer with a blanket of biting frost.

lines.name: The Hardened Armour
lines.prophecyText: You will greatly enhance the quality of an armour piece with a single Armourer's Scrap
lines.flavourText: The rings that bind grow tighter, the plate thicker, the leather denser, all with a single touch.

lines.name: The Plaguemaw II
lines.prophecyText: You will encounter shadowy monsters in the Crypt, Bone Crypt Map, Cursed Crypt Map, or Necropolis Map and slay them.
lines.flavourText: The Plaguemaw's followers feed on the flesh of the dead; a desecration of the Mother's work.

lines.name: The Warmongers III
lines.prophecyText: You will encounter and slay several Warbands and their elite soldiers.
lines.flavourText: Failure twice draws the ire of higher ranking soldiers. They come to spill blood.

lines.name: Day of Sacrifice II
lines.prophecyText: You will open a corrupted rare strongbox that will contain a Sacrifice at Noon fragment.
lines.flavourText: Beneath the midday sun, treasure, stained by corruption, invites an ambush.

lines.name: The Wealthy Exile
lines.prophecyText: You will encounter and slay a Rogue Exile who wears only rare items.
lines.flavourText: They flee from the eyes of Oriath, coated in gold from head to toe.

lines.name: The Ambitious Bandit I
lines.prophecyText: You will encounter and slay bandits in an area where they do not ordinarily appear.
lines.flavourText: A bandit's ambition grows, and so too does the path it walks.

lines.name: The Cursed Choir
lines.prophecyText: You will discover an area with large packs of Sea Witches.
lines.flavourText: The sea witch whispers sweet nothings, and calms the hearts of unlikely allies.

lines.name: The Last Watch
lines.prophecyText: You will track down a powerful Ancient Archer who will drop a unique item when slain.
lines.flavourText: A loyal soldier in life, he stands watch, bow in hand, waiting to be sent to the Mother of death.

lines.name: Fallow At Last
lines.prophecyText: You will fight waves of risen farmers amongst the ruins of a house in Crossroads.
lines.flavourText: The farmer's time came long ago, his ruined home the site of a dark harvest.

lines.name: The Plaguemaw III
lines.prophecyText: You will be ambushed by the Plaguemaw's followers after you kill a certain very powerful monster.
lines.flavourText: The Plaguemaw watches you with a glistening grin, waiting for a moment to send his shadows.

lines.name: Winter's Mournful Melodies
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat Soulmourn while holding Hrimnor's Hymn
lines.flavourText: A mournful hymn, a mournful soul, the chill of death on the wind.

lines.name: Holding the Bridge
lines.prophecyText: You will encounter and slay two powerful Blackguard captains near the Ebony Barracks bridge.
lines.flavourText: Where those in black swarm across the stone steps, one's blood runs cold with hatred and one's eyes crackle with wrath.

lines.name: The Feral Lord IV
lines.prophecyText: You will discover and slay a very powerful Vulture within Sarn's borders or Maps of Sarn.
lines.flavourText: The Feral Lord senses your presence. In the shell of the snail, the vulture seeks a fresh carcass.

lines.name: The Singular Spirit
lines.prophecyText: You will slay a Tormented spirit that carries a unique item.
lines.flavourText: A life spent fleeing from the law leaves the spirit ready to escape with its newfound treasure.

lines.name: Undead Uprising
lines.prophecyText: You will travel to the Old Fields, where you will encounter and slay an army of the undead.
lines.flavourText: The green and verdant field is swathed in night, the farmers who tended to it rise again.

lines.name: Hidden Reinforcements
lines.prophecyText: You will be ambushed by several enemies upon slaying a foe.
lines.flavourText: Cowardly foes lay in wait. A show of force reveals their true intentions.

lines.name: Fear's Wide Reach
lines.prophecyText: You will track down a powerful Devourer who will drop a unique item when slain.
lines.flavourText: The unseen enemy travels through unseen tunnels. Its reach is small, but its effect is large.

lines.name: The Feral Lord II
lines.prophecyText: You will encounter a powerful beast in the Northern Forest, Jungle Valley Map, or Dark Forest Map and slay it.
lines.flavourText: The Feral Lord's cold breath imbues and empowers the beast in the northern wood.

lines.name: The Flow of Energy
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat Shavronne while holding Shavronne's Pace.
lines.flavourText: The Aesthete sustains herself in unnatural ways. When movement fails, energy flows.

lines.name: Mysterious Invaders
lines.prophecyText: You will find and destroy monsters from Beyond who are trying to invade Wraeclast through the map device.
lines.flavourText: Beyond the golden gears, the edges of reality crack, and something hidden from sight spills through.

lines.name: The Lost Maps
lines.prophecyText: You will find maps near the centre of the Chamber of Sins.
lines.flavourText: A device of great power once held by the prodigy spills forth the keys to new worlds.

lines.name: The Warmongers II
lines.prophecyText: You will encounter and slay several Warbands and their reinforcements.
lines.flavourText: The vanguard did not return, so more have followed their path, bringing war with them.

lines.name: Storm on the Reef
lines.prophecyText: You will track down a powerful Brine Vassal who will drop a unique item when slain.
lines.flavourText: Lightning flashes overhead. Bloated bodies wash ashore. One stands, walks, and stretches its wing.

lines.name: Day of Sacrifice III
lines.prophecyText: You will enter a difficult Vaal side area that contains an additional Sacrifice at Dusk fragment.
lines.flavourText: The ancient red army opens a powerful path before the setting sun.

lines.name: Graceful Flames
lines.prophecyText: You will track down a powerful Flame Sentinel who will drop a unique item when slain.
lines.flavourText: Crimson fabric flutters with fury and flame, but a gilded prize lies within.

lines.name: Nemesis of Greed
lines.prophecyText: You will slay a rare but powerful foe who then drops two unique items instead of one.
lines.flavourText: A collector of antiquities doubles their treasures, relinquishing them only with their final breath.

lines.name: Strong as a Bull
lines.prophecyText: You will track down a powerful Fighting Bull who will drop a unique item when slain.
lines.flavourText: Strength to rival the Karui King charges through the Sword King's dream.

lines.name: Thaumaturgical History III
lines.prophecyText: You will inspect the Ancient Reverie Device in the Chamber of Sins.
lines.flavourText: The Soulless One's gift to the Prodigy draws forth those who seek the same unnatural power.

lines.name: The Fall of an Empire
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat Shadow of the Vaal while holding Quecholli.
lines.flavourText: The Vaal's dark machinery was their greatest triumph, and its destruction another's destiny.

lines.name: Lightning Falls
lines.prophecyText: You will discover an area with an Electrocuting Tempest
lines.flavourText: The storms above strike with precision. A deft foot will avoid the blows.

lines.name: The Lady in Black
lines.prophecyText: You will track down a powerful Blackguard Arcmage who will drop a unique item when slain.
lines.flavourText: Lightning's hum grows louder and louder in the hands of the lady in black.

lines.name: The Invader
lines.prophecyText: You will encounter a very powerful invading monster and slay it.
lines.flavourText: A horror from the past returns to cause pain in a place that it never called home.

lines.name: The Unbreathing Queen I
lines.prophecyText: You will encounter spectres in the Fellshrine Ruins, Cemetery Map, or Graveyard Map and slay them.
lines.flavourText: The Unbreathing Queen masterminds an unholy heist, a defilement of the dead.

lines.name: The Petrified
lines.prophecyText: You will track down a powerful Pocked Lanternbearer who will drop a unique item when slain.
lines.flavourText: Lightless halls hewn in stone swell with the malformed, the twisted, the hardened and the dangerous.

lines.name: From The Void
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat Bameth while holding Blackheart.
lines.flavourText: The iron heart, burned in the blackness of the void that lies beyond sight, rots all it touches.

lines.name: Roth's Legacy
lines.prophecyText: You will track down a powerful Oak's Devoted who will drop a unique item when slain.
lines.flavourText: The devotee holds a relic of the pirate's past, looted and lost for an age.

lines.name: Deadly Rivalry III
lines.prophecyText: You will encounter the rival Exile, now possessed by a Tormented Spirit.
lines.flavourText: Their body broken and mended, now a conduit for a greater power.

lines.name: Overflowing Riches
lines.prophecyText: You will slay a foe who erupts into currency.
lines.flavourText: A full pocket, severed, spills forth like a struck spring.

lines.name: The Hungering Swarm
lines.prophecyText: You will discover an area with large packs of Insects.
lines.flavourText: Skittering across the ground, insects nest near unlikely allies.

lines.name: The Sharpened Blade
lines.prophecyText: You will greatly enhance the quality of a weapon with a single Blacksmith's Whetstone.
lines.flavourText: The metal softens beneath the stone, reshaping with great ease.

lines.name: Abnormal Effulgence
lines.prophecyText: You will track down a powerful Chaos Sentinel in a map who will drop a unique item when slain.
lines.flavourText: Living stone and effulgence, nothing moves unhindered beneath the weight of its dark presence.

lines.name: The Queen's Vaults
lines.prophecyText: You will slay Atziri, Queen of the Vaal, and gain access to her Vaults.
lines.flavourText: The Red Queen holds the key to her vaults, and only death will loosen her grip.

lines.name: Blinding Light
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat Jorus, Sky's Edge while holding Eclipse Solaris.
lines.flavourText: The light fades from one source but grows in another, blinding those who approach.

lines.name: The Trembling Earth
lines.prophecyText: You will discover an area with many Devourers.
lines.flavourText: The earth shifts beneath the feet of many, but they are not the prey this monster seeks.

lines.name: Hidden Vaal Pathways
lines.prophecyText: You will enter a hidden Vaal area that contains powerful enemies.
lines.flavourText: Ancient foes open new paths to the land they left barren.

lines.name: Unbearable Whispers I
lines.prophecyText: You will discover a tome in the Library, Academy Map, Museum Map, or Scriptorium Map.
lines.flavourText: Dark runes skitter across the pages of the tome, concealing the Whisperer's allies.

lines.name: The Stockkeeper
lines.prophecyText: You will encounter the Stockkeeper at the Grain Gate and slay him.
lines.flavourText: A man survives only by his greed, but a single weapon cuts down the man who has many.

lines.name: Hunter's Lesson
lines.prophecyText: You will slay a powerful foe and gain its powers.
lines.flavourText: An adversary, slain, briefly lives on in the lessons taught to the slayer.

lines.name: A Firm Foothold
lines.prophecyText: You will track down a powerful Seething Brine who will drop a unique item when slain.
lines.flavourText: Water slicks the stone, a misstep chills the bone, the living pools hold the cure.

lines.name: A Valuable Combination
lines.prophecyText: You will receive an extra Chaos Orb from a vendor when you trade items that would result in a Chaos Orb.
lines.flavourText: When the sum is already greater than the parts, there is room to make it greater still.

lines.name: Notched Flesh
lines.prophecyText: You will track down a powerful Pocked Mason who will drop a unique item when slain.
lines.flavourText: Stiff is the bow. Brittle is the flesh that holds it. Deep are the holes it leaves.

lines.name: The Bloody Flowers Redux
lines.prophecyText: You will defeat the Gemling Legionnaires while holding Ezomyte Peak
lines.flavourText: Ezomyte banners flutter through the air as embellished monsters fall, a reenactment of the slave's final victory.

lines.name: Touched by the Wind
lines.prophecyText: You will use an Orb of Transmutation on a pair of boots and it will gain movement speed.
lines.flavourText: Stitched with blue thread, a swift boot covers great distances.

lines.name: Vaal Invasion
lines.prophecyText: You will find Vaal invaders in the Temple of Lunaris and destroy the monster who is leading them.
lines.flavourText: At the site of a great atrocity, the shadows of the distant past hang over the risen red army.

lines.name: Smothering Tendrils
lines.prophecyText: You will use an Orb of Transmutation on a map and it will gain a smothering atmosphere.
lines.flavourText: Blue tendrils wrap around the markings, constricting and smothering the stone beneath.

lines.name: The Feral Lord I
lines.prophecyText: You will encounter corrupted animals in the Southern Forest or Tropical Island Map and slay them.
lines.flavourText: The Feral Lord in the southern wood twists the wild to his will.

lines.name: The Brothers of Necromancy
lines.prophecyText: You will encounter four necromancers with their undead minions and slay them all.
lines.flavourText: Four of shared flesh and blood raise an army of borrowed blood and bone.

lines.name: Rebirth
lines.prophecyText: You will slay a normal foe, who will be resurrected and granted new power.
lines.flavourText: An ordinary life, an ordinary death, marked by an extraordinary rebirth.

lines.name: Soil, Worms and Blood
lines.prophecyText: You will discover an area with large packs of Undead monsters.
lines.flavourText: The unliving crowd into the dwellings of unlikely allies.

lines.name: The Ambitious Bandit II
lines.prophecyText: You will encounter and slay bandits in the Marketplace, Arcade Map, Bazaar Map, or Port Map.
lines.flavourText: A bandit seeks a relic for the greedy where greed was once a great virtue.

lines.name: Against the Tide
lines.prophecyText: You will track down a powerful Dockhand Wraith who will drop a unique item when slain.
lines.flavourText: Taken by the fickle tides, the Captain's bow washes against the dock from which he set sail.

lines.name: Ending the Torment
lines.prophecyText: You will slay a powerful foe who will release a Tormented Spirit.
lines.flavourText: A fearsome foe's inner torment spills out into the world.

lines.name: From Death Springs Life
lines.prophecyText: You will track down a powerful Dripping Dead who will drop a unique item when slain.
lines.flavourText: Fetid waters carry the dead downstream, but walking in the mud, the dead one carries life.

lines.name: Lasting Impressions
lines.prophecyText: You will read something written long ago.
lines.flavourText: A hand scrawls on a wall, or carves into bone, a tale that undoes the world and teaches those who come after.

lines.name: The Unbreathing Queen III
lines.prophecyText: You will encounter the spirit of a hero in the Beacon or Lighthouse Map and defeat it.
lines.flavourText: Water crashes against stone; A victim of the Unbreathing Queen burns with desire for The Mother's domain.

lines.name: Unbearable Whispers II
lines.prophecyText: You will discover a tome upon slaying a monster in the Sceptre of God, Palace Map, Residence Map, or Villa Map.
lines.flavourText: The Whisperer leaves a tome in the tower, held by a maddened follower.

lines.name: The Unbreathing Queen II
lines.prophecyText: You will encounter the spirit of a hero in the Lord's Labyrinth and defeat it.
lines.flavourText: The flesh is taken by the Unbreathing Queen. But the hero's soul, bitter and cold, remains trapped in the Emperor's greatest trial.

lines.name: Golden Touch
lines.prophecyText: You will use an Orb of Transmutation on an item and it will grant extra mods.
lines.flavourText: Blue tendrils entangle and change. All that remains is gold.

lines.name: The God of Misfortune
lines.prophecyText: You will destroy the false idols Kuduku and Kadaka
lines.flavourText: Pagan mouths worship pagan gods; false idols for false promises.

lines.name: Unbearable Whispers III
lines.prophecyText: You will slay Shavronne, and she will drop a tome.
lines.flavourText: The Aesthete holds the Whisperer's forbidden words safe, deep in the beast's belly.

lines.name: The Undead Brutes
lines.prophecyText: You will seek out and destroy a group of seven powerful undead.
lines.flavourText: Powerful soldiers of a forgotten time reunite and march once again.
